text: Na'ankure Moapu mopamo'a havizantfa hanige'za Moapu vahe'mo'za zavira ategahaze. Ana hanige'za Moapu vahe'mo'za zamagazegu nehu'za zamavugosa rukrahe hugahaze. Hagi Moapu vahe tva'onte'ma nemaniza vahe'mo'za zamagrite'ma fore'ma hania zama nege'za tusi zamagogogu nehu'za, kiza zokago ke huzmantegahaze.
